hero.name: hero
hero.title: Turn Any Emoji Into Pixel Art
hero.description: Transform your favorite emojis into retro 8-bit pixel art instantly. Just enter an emoji and watch the magic happen.
hero.tip: ✨ Sign in to save your creations and view them in the gallery

gallery.name: gallery
gallery.title: Pixel Art Gallery
gallery.description: Discover amazing pixel art created by our community. Each piece is generated from a single emoji.

brand.title: PX-EMOJI
brand.description: Transform your favorite emojis into retro 8-bit pixel art instantly.
